_header: My hearts treasure and sweet assured foe
Title(s): ‘To a Ladye quhone he list to feyne’
_description: ‘To a Ladye quhone he list to feyne’, by William Dunbar — seven stanzas rhyme royal

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
My hartis tresure and swete assured foThe finale endar of my lyfe
                    for ever…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…And quhill my mynd may think and towng may steirAnd syne fair
                    weill my hartis ladie deir
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Author: Quod Dumbar quhone he list to feyne (p. 323)
